subject: feat: add Projects tab and new repos (budgy-ting, tool-till-tees)
body:
- Add Projects tab to dashboard with live project directory
  - Cards for all 14 repos, split into "Live Projects" (8 with sites)
    and "Other Repositories" (6 without)
  - Each card shows name, language badge, commit count, and links
    to live site and GitHub repo
  - Fetches from projects.json (static data alongside data.json)
- Add budgy-ting and tool-till-tees to config/repos.json
- Re-aggregate dashboard data from existing processed commits

https://claude.ai/code/session_012JtBabbz3ZyR2fgYwfqzf3
title: add Projects tab and new repos (budgy-ting, tool-till-tees)
